name: ChartGame
description:
How much is the earning rate of your stock?

'Chart Game' is a stock investing game based on past data of actual stock market.

◆◆◆ How to play ◆◆◆
► Stock chart will appear as you start the game.
► Based on the chart, you can determine buy & sell points for investment.
► An investment period is 1 year. After the period, you can invest in other stock items.
►The exchange rate in the game is as follow: $1 = ¥100 = ₩1000.

◆◆◆ Features ◆◆◆
● You can compete with your friends on Facebook.
● You can register your name on 'the richest people in the world'.
● Make 14 achievements accomplished by 400 richest people in America.

Make yourself richer than Bill gates and become one of the richest people in the world
